DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to assess the safety of using continuous regional anesthesia for post-operative analgesia during septic limb orthopedic surgery. The study hypothesis is that continuous regional anesthesia would not induce septic complication in the operated limb and could improve post-operative recovery.
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Regional Anesthesia for Septic Limb Orthopedic Surgery
